comments.body: Can we follow the style of the other blocks and add a newline here?

Oh, master code base was updated...
I'll follow that.
Could we make this more general, something like `dev/lint-scripts`.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -133,6 +133,15 @@ CURRENT_BLOCK=$BLOCK_PYTHON_STYLE
 
 echo ""
 echo "========================================================================="
+echo "Running Windows batch file style checks"
+echo "========================================================================="
+
+CURRENT_BLOCK=$BLOCK_WINDOWS_BATCH_FILE_STYLE
+
+./dev/lint-windows-cmd
